messages.msgSnippet: www.goddessmoon.org acts as an umbrella school in several states, I don t know which cos I m in England!  Best wishes on this leg of your journey of
messages.messageBody:
www.goddessmoon.org acts as an umbrella school in several
states, I don't know which cos I'm in England! Best wishes on
this leg of your journey of deschooling!

Tracy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] diplomas
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/24/2000 3:13:23 PM Central Daylight Time, ... I m sure lots of people might suggest that you print one up on your computer. But, if you re
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/24/2000 3:13:23 PM Central Daylight Time,
JWWBIGHOUSE@... writes:

> Help! I have only been homeschooling for one year and I love it, but
> now I am trying to unschool. I have a 6th grader and a 10th grader
> who love the whole process. I would like to know what am I to do
> about a diploma. If anyone can help me, I would greatly appreciate
> it. Thanks. John
>


I'm sure lots of people might suggest that you print one up on your computer.
But, if you're looking for a more "official" document, Clonlara School helps
unschoolers and other homeschoolers turn their activities into transcripts
and diplomas. Their URL is www.clonlara.org.

Carron
